blogPost.title: What advice do you give to anyone who is interested in becoming a local journalist? Answer by Ken Ward Jr., Reporter at The Charleston Gazette-Mail, West Virginia. https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: ローカルジャーナリストを目指す人にアドバイスをお願いします。回答：Ken Ward Jr., The Charleston Gazette-Mail (West Virginia) レポーター https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN
对于有兴趣成为当地记者的人，你有什么建议？回答者：Ken Ward Jr.，西弗吉尼亚州《查尔斯顿公报-邮报》的记者。https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN
對於有興趣成爲當地記者的人，你有什麼建議？回答者：Ken Ward Jr.，西弗吉尼亞州《查爾斯頓公報-郵報》的記者。https://t.co/IMhc7gHoad https://t.co/ozDz1EOepN

previous.title: As technology advances, what kinds of legal functions will be automated? Answer by Jonathan O’Connell, Partner @atrium. https://t.co/wju1a79z6r https://t.co/4ehSFHX2hi

localize.full_text: テクノロジーの進歩により、どのような法務機能が自動化されるのでしょうか？Answer by Jonathan O'Connell, Partner @atrium. https://t.co/wju1a79z6r https://t.co/4ehSFHX2hi
随着技术的发展，什么样的法律职能将被自动化？回答者：Jonathan O'Connell，合伙人 @atrium. https://t.co/wju1a79z6r https://t.co/4ehSFHX2hi
隨着技術的發展，什麼樣的法律職能將被自動化？回答者：Jonathan O'Connell，合夥人 @atrium. https://t.co/wju1a79z6r https://t.co/4ehSFHX2hi

next.title: What groups are most marginalized regarding access to fertility treatment? Answer by @tammysun, CEO and co-founder @CarrotFertility. https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF

localize.full_text: 不妊治療へのアクセスに関して、最も疎外されているグループはどこですか？回答者：@tammysun, CEO and co-founder @CarrotFertility. https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
在获得生育治疗方面，哪些群体最被边缘化？由@tammysun，首席执行官和联合创始人@CarrotFertility回答。https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
在獲得生育治療方面，哪些羣體最被邊緣化？由@tammysun，首席執行官和聯合創始人@CarrotFertility回答。https://t.co/tZPnjk9F7O https://t.co/oGC3XqqmCF
